p.p:
A subset of SNOMED CT intended for use in the UK, a set of concepts, which represent the type of consent.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Document Consent subset with subset original id 43961000000137.
The use of this subset is Advisory, as defined in the "Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains" document located under the Associated Specifications tab.

concept.displayName: Consent given for electronic record sharing
Consent given for electronic record sharing with carer
Consent given for upload to local shared electronic record
Consent given for upload to national shared electronic record
Consent given to share patient data with specified third party
Declined consent to share patient data with specified third party
Refused consent for upload to local shared electronic record
Refused consent for upload to national shared electronic record
